title: T213-2 #232 Sweeney for Trade VG to EX
author: jonron42

posts.post_title: T213-2 #232 Sweeney for Trade VG to EX
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade a T213-2 #232 Bill Sweeney. Uniform says Boston and Bottom of card says Chicago National League. Back of card is Coupon logo. Card is in VG-EX condition.

I am looking to trade for my set needs or any EXMT or better cards in the 60s up to 1972. Looking for $600 in trade for the card.

Please check out my trade page at:

[url]http://samstradingpost.com/trader/ronscardz.aspx[/url]

Thanks,
Ron Hanna
